DOC.brief_summary: This safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics study bimatoprost male patient androgenetic alopecia ( AGA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Bimatoprost Men With Androgenetic Alopecia ( AGA )
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate male pattern baldness ( androgenic alopecia ) ongoing hair loss least 1 year History Paget 's disease , osteoporosis , bone malignancy History bone fracture within previous 12 month , except metatarsal , metacarpal , skull fracture Patient currently undergo radiation therapy anticipate undergo radiation therapy time study Drug alcohol abuse within 12 month HIV positive Received hair transplant scalp reduction Use hair weave , hair extension wigs within 3 month Application topical medication , minoxidil nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) scalp within 4 week
